name: Willow Wood Refuge
description:
YOUR EYES OPEN

The stench of burning houses still lingers in the air

5 survivors stumble their way into your forest encampment

You can tell they won’t last long without your help

The attack left them pale and sickly

YOU STAND UP

And prepare to delve deeper into the cave 

Deeper than you ever wanted to go... 

To get what they need to survive

KEY FEATURES
  • A unique but old school pixel art style
  • A mix of relaxing campsite vibes and tense cave spelunking excitement
  • Passive world building via a plethora of NPC to NPC dialogue 

A University of California Santa Cruz senior capstone project!

Made by aaallmost entirely UCSC students!

DEV TEAM Saenz - Production
Derek Gomez - UI DesignAlec Wolf - ProgrammingSimone Barie - ArtSimon Lemay - Art Alex Borlin - ProgrammingShui Lau - Gameplay DesignAaron Harrison - Gameplay DesignEdmund Liang - ProgrammingRyan Marcus - WritingRyan Kim - Sound Design     Kostantinos Anthoulis - Music Production
